items.description: * Serves 10-12 *  Citrus-marinated, flame-grilled chicken (2 pieces per person). 2 X-large side dishes (see choices below), warm flour or corn tortillas, tortilla chips, and fresh salsa. Plus, serving utensils, plates, napkins and cutlery.
items.title: 24 Piece Chicken Meal

items.description: 24 pieces of citrus-marinated, flame-grilled chicken, warm flour or corn tortillas, and fresh salsa.
items.title: Additional Chicken - 24 Pieces

items.description: * Serves 6-8 *  4 burritos cut in half plus fresh salsa. Your choice of Chicken & Avocado (stuffed with our citrus-marinated flame-grilled chicken, fresh avocado, cabbage and creamy cilantro dressing), The Poblano (chicken, avocado, rice, pinto beans, flame-grilled corn, cilantro, diced onions, melted Jack cheese and a mild salsa prepared with Poblano chilies, or The Spicy Chipotle (chicken, rice, pinto beans, pico de gallo, sour cream, cilantro, melted Jack cheese and a spicy, smoky fire-roasted Chipotle salsa.
items.title: Burrito Platter
